title: Bathroom Remodel Contractors in Seattle, Cost of Bathroom Remodel
description: Bathroom remodels with Renova Contractors LLC on schedule and budget. Free cost estimates with discounts on bathroom fixtures and bathroom tile.

hero.heroP: Renova Contractors LLC handles full-scope bathroom remodeling in Seattle, from layout changes to finish installs. We build walk-in showers with custom shower tile, waterproofed pans, and recessed shower niches for storage üöø. If you want to rework the layout, we relocate plumbing, reframe for new vanities, or move walls as needed. All materials ‚Äî toilets, vanities, flooring, fixtures, shower glass, etc. ‚Äî can be sourced through us at contractor pricing. We install heated bathroom floors üî•, wall-hung vanities, and custom tile surrounds with Schluter waterproofing. Timelines are set upfront, with no change orders unless you ask for them. You‚Äôll get manufacturer warranties on tile, fixtures, and flooring ‚Äî plus our own labor guarantee. Everything‚Äôs built to code, inspected, and handed over clean.
hero.heroPhrase: Some people look for a beautiful place, others make a place beautiful.

about.phrase1: Good design can transform a bathroom from a functional space to a relaxing retreat.
about.phrase2: Every bathroom deserves a touch of elegance and a splash of comfort.
about.priceLine1: Basic Remodel: üöø Update fixtures, vanity, and tile for $15,000-$25,000. A fresh new look on a budget!
about.priceLine2: Luxury Remodel: üõÅ Upgrade with custom finishes, heated floors, and high-end fixtures for $30,000-$50,000+. Create your dream bathroom!
about.image1alt: A modern bathroom remodel featuring a white toilet next to a vanity with a light wood cabinet, black handles, and a white countertop. A wall-mounted mirror above the vanity and a partially open door leading to another room with hardwood flooring complete this sleek remodeling project.
about.image2alt: A modern bathroom remodel features a bathtub with sliding glass doors and blue subway tile walls. Adjacent is a white vanity with a matching sink and a chrome faucet under a large mirror. Shelves and a small window are visible, providing light and storage.
about.sectionP1: Your bathroom is a place to relax and enjoy the quietness of it all. The last thing you want is to fumble through the clutter and hit your elbows on bathroom fixtures. Renova Contractors LLC gives you the option to use all of the space in your bathroom or expand the room itself. Expansion can be costly because extensive architectural and structural changes, along with electrical and plumbing work, are required. Depending on your budget, we can discuss the different options you have.
about.sectionP2: If your budget does not allow for wall relocation, we propose a solution that optimizes the available space in the room. This involves removing your tub and shower combination to create a single walk-in shower, which you can customize to your preferred dimensions. Built-in wall shelves and niches can make the bathroom feel much more open, and if you install a pedestal sink, you're giving it a less cluttered feel. Our interior designer will make sure that the new bathroom layout is functional and optimal. When you want to extend your bathroom beyond its current footprint, we will have our structural engineer consult you on how to best proceed and the project's feasibility. When doing a bathroom remodel, we often change the electrical wiring and the layout of the plumbing pipes, so when doing such an extensive remodel, there will be no problem with the additional wiring and plumbing. Keep in mind that the installation of bathroom tiles heavily depends not only on the square footage, but also on the overall complexity of the tile and its pattern. For example, a small walk-in shower with a complex tile design may cost more than a larger walk-in shower with a simple, pattern-free design. When doing a bathroom remodel, we provide you with a cost sheet that is transparent and very accurate. We pride ourselves on our accuracy with the price, so we can explore different options for the bathroom renovation project.
about.section2H2: Renova Contractors LLC Go-to For Bathroom Remodel
about.section2P1: We are a company that takes a client-centered approach to all of our projects. We provide you with a clear-cut cost sheet and a fantastic warranty. Before the project starts, we provide you with a detailed project schedule that we adhere to vigorously while remaining flexible. Renova Contractors LLC believes in our management style and adherence to deadlines, so we also provide you with a $50 discount for every day that we are behind. We provide you with a variety of discounts and complimentary services, including free consultations with our interior designer and free 3D renderings. Our architect also offers complimentary consultations. Imagine having three professionals working on your bathroom renovation project at all times: an interior designer, an architect, and a project manager. However, we offer even more. At home or on vacation, you can check our video monitoring system we installed with your permission to track the project's progress. You can relax and not worry. Once the designer finalizes the 3D rendering based on your notes and vision, we begin procuring bathroom fixtures such as tubs, faucets, and showerheads. We offer free delivery and always pass on our contractor discount to you.
about.section2P2: Each bathroom renovation project entails electrical and plumbing installation; for all this, our licensed electricians and licensed plumbers pull permits and pass all necessary inspections. Our tile installation team is perfect at making sure that your shower is waterproof and sealed correctly. Before we tile a custom shower, the project manager thoroughly inspects it for water leaks and drainage. You must approve each stage of the bathroom renovation project before we proceed to the next. We keep you updated daily and make sure you are up to date with all the things going on. With an extensive remodel, we also offer our clients a complimentary house cleaning. After you do a final walkthrough of the project with us, we will then provide you with a free house cleaning service as a token of appreciation.

ourServices.paragraph: When it comes to bathrooms, RENOVA handles every part of the job ‚Äî start to finish. We offer bathroom remodeling services in Seattle that cover everything from cabinet installation, vanity replacement, and layout reconfiguration, to full plumbing and electrical rough-ins ‚ö°üöø. Whether you're adding a walk-in shower, a freestanding tub, or reworking the space to include double sinks or a larger linen closet, we build it to code. Most remodels involve detailed tile installation ‚Äî we do shower surrounds, accent walls, floor tile, and backsplashes, with waterproofing systems like Schluter behind every wet zone. Heated floor systems can be installed under tile for added comfort üî•. Every bathroom renovation includes licensed trades and exact planning for lighting, GFCI outlets, drain lines, and venting. You can also request standalone services like floor tile replacement, toilet relocation, or shower glass install ‚Äî our team can break it down piece by piece.

array.heading: Bathroom Tile
array.paragraph: Bathroom tile installation offers the opportunity to refresh your bathroom without major changes, keeping it simple and elegant.

ourServices.ourServicesMarkdown:
RENOVA Contractors LLC is a licensed bathroom remodeling company in Seattle. We handle full bathroom remodels ‚Äì demo, framing, waterproofing, tile, plumbing, and finish work. Whether it‚Äôs a hallway bath or a full custom primary suite, we manage every part of the job ‚Äì no guesswork, no shortcuts.

### What‚Äôs Included:
- üß∞ **Full demo** ‚Äì Down to studs and subfloor ‚Äì no tiling over old rot or bad board  
- üß± **Waterproofing systems** ‚Äì Schluter KERDI, Wedi, or RedGard ‚Äì all installed to code and flood-tested if required  
- üõÅ **Shower builds** ‚Äì Custom tile showers, pans, benches, niches, and glass ‚Äì slope-checked and vented  
- üîß **Plumbing** ‚Äì Drain, vent, and supply moved or upgraded ‚Äì UPC compliant  
- ‚ö° **Electrical** ‚Äì GFCI outlets, lighting, fan circuits ‚Äì updated per NEC with full grounding  
- ü™µ **Vanities & tops** ‚Äì Plywood vanities, quartz or stone tops, under-mount sinks  
- üß± **Tile install** ‚Äì Floors, walls, base, trim ‚Äì grouted and sealed  
- üßΩ **Paint, doors, trim** ‚Äì Moisture-rated drywall, clean paint lines, casing, and baseboard  
- üöΩ **Toilet, fixtures, accessories** ‚Äì Installed level, pressure-tested, caulked, and clean

We also include free interior design support for layout, tile choices, fixtures, and lighting. **Permits are pulled with the City of Seattle**, and we handle every inspection.

If you're searching for a dependable bathroom remodel contractor in Seattle, or comparing Seattle bathroom remodel companies, **RENOVA Contractors LLC** builds clean, builds tight, and gets it done right. ‚úÖüìêüõ†Ô∏è

manufacturers.p: Renova Contractors LLC highlights the importance of great products, especially when it comes to plumbing fixtures in the bathroom, since this is the last place you want something to go wrong. We work with several manufacturers, like Moen, Delta, Grohe, and Kohler, among many others, who have proven that their products are of high quality and durable against frequent usage.
manufacturers.markdownmanufacturers:
We remodel bathrooms across Seattle and take care of the materials too ‚Äî so you don‚Äôt have to shop around or guess what fits. We use suppliers we trust and install everything ourselves üëá

### ü™û Vanities & Storage

- **ProCraft**, **Luban**, and **Bellmont** ‚Äì Quality vanities with soft-close drawers, smooth finishes, and solid build.  
- **Golden Home** ‚Äì Budget-friendly storage options like floating shelves and extra cabinets that still look clean.  

### üß± Bathroom Tile Options

- **United Tile** ‚Äì Affordable **ceramic tile** for floors and walls (starts around $2.99/sq. ft.).  
- **Daltile** ‚Äì Great for **slate floors** or **wood-look tile** that works in wet areas.  
- **CFM** ‚Äì Classic **subway tile** with a glossy finish ‚Äî easy to clean.  
- **Statements Tile** ‚Äì If you want something bold or modern for the shower wall or a niche.  

### üöø Fixtures & Details

- **Ferguson** ‚Äì Sinks, faucets, and shower heads in **matte black**, **brushed nickel**, or whatever finish you want.  
- **Schluter** ‚Äì For **heated bathroom floors** and waterproofing under tile ‚Äî we use it on almost every job.  

### üîß Install & Warranty

- We install everything: **vanities**, **tile**, **toilets**, **floor heat**, **lighting**, and more ‚Äî no third parties.  
- Materials are ordered ahead so we‚Äôre not waiting. If it's in stock, we usually start in **under 3 days**.  
- Every job comes with a **2-year warranty on labor** and longer guarantees on most materials.

If you're doing a bathroom remodel in Seattle ‚Äî full or small ‚Äî we‚Äôll build it right, and you won‚Äôt have to chase parts or fix stuff after.

howWeWork.howWeWorkMarkdown:
At RENOVA, we approach each **bathroom remodel** like a construction project ‚Äî not a cosmetic upgrade. Everything is planned around your space, your fixtures, and actual code requirements in Seattle üõ†Ô∏è. No guesswork, no ‚Äúwe‚Äôll figure it out later.‚Äù Here‚Äôs how we work:

### üîç Step-by-Step Process

- **üë£ Site Visit** ‚Äì We take measurements, and assess plumbing, framing, electrical, and ventilation.  
- **üìê Scope & Planning** ‚Äì You pick materials or we help you select; we finalize layout, rough-in locations, and fixture specs.  
- **üì¶ Material Prep** ‚Äì We order all major items: tile, vanities, fixtures, toilets, glass, and store them until demo.  
- **üß± Demo & Rough-In** ‚Äì Old surfaces removed. We reroute plumbing and wiring as needed; install backing for wall-hung items.  
- **üßØ Waterproofing & Tile** ‚Äì We prep wet areas using waterproofing membrane and install tile (floor, shower, walls).  
- **üöø Fixture Install** ‚Äì Everything goes in: toilet, vanity, tub, shower glass, mirrors, lighting.  
- **üßΩ Final Touches** ‚Äì Paint, caulking, trim, and final walkthrough.  

Everything is built to code, clean, and made to last ‚Äî no shortcuts.

faqItems.question: What is the typical timeline for a bathroom remodel?
faqItems.answer: The timeline for a bathroom remodel can vary depending on the scope of the project. On average, a complete bathroom remodel can take 2-4 weeks from start to finish and heavily depends on what layout changes you want to make. .

faqItems.question: Do I need to move out during the bathroom remodel?
faqItems.answer: In most cases, you do not need to move out during a bathroom remodel. Our team works efficiently to minimize disruption to your daily life. However, there may be times when the bathroom is inaccessible for short periods.

faqItems.question: What are the latest trends in bathroom design?
faqItems.answer: Some of the latest trends in bathroom design include the use of natural materials, such as wood and stone, walk-in showers with frameless glass doors, and smart bathroom technology like touchless faucets and smart mirrors.

faqItems.question: How do I choose the right bathroom fixtures?
faqItems.answer: Choosing the right bathroom fixtures involves considering both functionality and style. Our design team can help you select fixtures that meet your needs and complement your overall bathroom design.

faqItems.question: What should I consider when planning a bathroom layout?
faqItems.answer: When planning a bathroom layout, consider factors like the placement of plumbing fixtures, storage needs, and the flow of the space. Maximizing natural light and ensuring easy access to essential items are also important.
